nodes.text: Someone left an old sea chest just lying around here.
What rogue could be expected to resist?
I did everything in my power to guard the contents, but somehow it's empty.
There are barnacles holding it in place. Besides, it's too bulky to haul around.
Let's hope no nasties sneak up on me while I pick the lock...
Rats. I need to practice my lockpicking skill more.
I really need some lockpicks to open this.
Looks like we have some goodies for me to loot!
I knew it! It's a trap!
A large and potentially very useful trap.
And there's some money to add to my purse.. if I had a purse. Let's see... ten... twenty... 23 Lyra!
Umm... blackguards must've made off with the contents of this chest already. Lovable blackguards.
